last_episode_to_air.name: Hegemony
last_episode_to_air.overview: When the U.S.S. Enterprise investigates an attack on a colony at the edge of Federation space, Captain Pike and his crew face the return of a formidable enemy.

name: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
overview: Follow Captain Christopher Pike, Science Officer Spock and Number One in the years before Captain Kirk boarded the U.S.S. Enterprise, as they explore new worlds around the galaxy.

episodes.name: Star Trek Day 2020 | Strange New Worlds Panel
episodes.overview: Strange New Worlds will follow the crew in the decade before Captain Kirk boarded the USS. Enterprise, as they explore new worlds around the galaxy.

episodes.name: Inside the Series
episodes.overview: Get a special preview of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds with host Wil Wheaton (The Ready Room)

episodes.name: Finding the Balance: Inside the Strange New Worlds Finale
episodes.overview: The cast and crew of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds discuss finding the balance between the new series and The Original Series.

episodes.name: Exploring New Worlds
episodes.overview: This feature documents the making of Season 1. Writers, producers, directors, and cast are interviewed about the making of the 10 episodes.

episodes.name: Pike's Peek
episodes.overview: Anson Mount takes fans through his journey as Captain Christopher Pike in the first season of Star Trek: Strange New Worlds, providing a peek into his portrayal with intimate footage throughout the season. This includes mobile phone camera personal logs of Anson’s experiences during his quarantine to wait before production of SNW season 1, and then preparing for the season, including practicing riding horses, their first day on the bridge set, and more. A particularly touching moment comes when Mount is standing on the Enterprise bridge set reading a lovely note from Mike Gold of NASA congratulating the cast and crew on the beginning of filming.

episodes.name: World Building
episodes.overview: Anson Mount gives us a tour of the AR volume, currently set up as the hostile snowy planet from episode 109. Production Designer Jonathan Lee discusses designing for the AR wall. Through interviews with producers, cast, and crew, fans will learn about the expertise involved in the development process and how the powerful technology was seamlessly integrated into the show.

episodes.name: Season 1 Gag Reel
episodes.overview: Classic bits of prop malfunctions, doors that don’t open on cue, line flubs, and general fun from the long hours shooting the first season.

episodes.name: Season 2: Exploring New Worlds
episodes.overview: This feature documents the making of season 2. Writers, producers, directors, and cast are interviewed about the making of this season.

episodes.name: Producing Props
episodes.overview: An inside look at some of the props and prosthetics used in season 2.

episodes.name: The Costumes Closet
episodes.overview: An insider's look at the costume design of season 2.

episodes.name: The Gorn
episodes.overview: An in-depth look at the Gorn in season 2, from hatchling to horror.

episodes.name: Singing in Space
episodes.overview: Leap into the music, choreography, and performances of Star Trek's first-ever musical episode.

episodes.name: Star Trek: The Original Series - S01E14 - Balance of Terror
episodes.overview: Kirk pits the Enterprise against an invisible spaceship testing the Federation's defenses.

episodes.name: Strange New Worlds
episodes.overview: When one of Pike’s officers goes missing while on a secret mission for Starfleet, Pike has to come out of self-imposed exile. He must navigate how to rescue his officer, while struggling with what to do with the vision of the future he’s been given.

episodes.name: Children of the Comet
episodes.overview: While on a survey mission, the U.S.S. Enterprise discovers a comet is going to strike an inhabited planet. They try to re-route the comet, only to find that an ancient alien relic buried on the comet’s icy surface is somehow stopping them. As the away team try to unlock the relic’s secrets, Pike and Number One deal with a group of zealots who want to prevent the U.S.S. Enterprise from interfering.

episodes.name: Ghosts of Illyria
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Enterprise encounters a contagion that ravages the ship. One by one, the entire crew is incapacitated except for Number One, Una Chin-Riley, who must now confront a secret she’s been hiding as she races to find a cure.

episodes.name: Memento Mori
episodes.overview: While on a routine supply mission to a colony planet, the U.S.S. Enterprise comes under an attack from an unknown malevolent force. Pike brings all his heart and experience to bear in facing the crisis, but the security officer warns him that the enemy cannot be dealt with by conventional Starfleet means.

episodes.name: Spock Amok
episodes.overview: It’s a comedy of manners when Spock has a personal visit in the middle of Spock and Captain Pike’s crucial negotiations with an unusual alien species.

episodes.name: Lift Us Where Suffering Cannot Reach
episodes.overview: A threat to an idyllic planet reunites Captain Pike with the lost love of his life. To protect her and a scientific holy child from a conspiracy, Pike offers his help and is forced to face unresolved feelings of his past.

episodes.name: The Serene Squall
episodes.overview: While on a dangerous humanitarian mission, the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise stumbles into a harrowing game of leverage with the quadrant’s deadliest space pirate.

episodes.name: The Elysian Kingdom
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Enterprise becomes stuck in a nebula that is home to an alien consciousness that traps the crew in a fairy tale.

episodes.name: All Those Who Wander
episodes.overview: The U.S.S. Enterprise crew comes face-to-face with their demons – and scary monsters too – when their landing party is stranded on a barren planet with a ravenous enemy.

episodes.name: A Quality of Mercy
episodes.overview: Just as Captain Pike thinks he's figured out how to escape his fate, he's visited by his future self, who shows him the consequences of his actions.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The series follows the voyages of the Starfleet starship USS Enterprise (NCC-1701), captained by Christopher Pike, during its second five-year mission (2259-2264), which precedes Captain James T. Kirk's five-year mission narrated in the television series Star Trek. The series picks up on stardate 1738.12 (2259), a couple of years after the events that occurred in the second season of the television series Star Trek: Discovery, when Pike temporarily captained the USS Discovery.

episodes.name: The Broken Circle
episodes.overview: A distress call from Lt. Noonien-Singh compels Spock to disobey orders and take the U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew into disputed space, risking renewed hostilities with the Klingons in a bid to aid their shipmate.

episodes.name: Ad Astra per Aspera
episodes.overview: Commander Una faces court-martial along with possible imprisonment and dishonorable dismissal from Starfleet, and her defense is in the hands of a lawyer who’s also a childhood friend with whom she had a terrible falling out.

episodes.name: Tomorrow and Tomorrow and Tomorrow
episodes.overview: La'an travels back in time to twenty-first-century Earth to prevent an attack which will alter humanity’s future history—and bring her face to face with her own contentious legacy.

guest_stars.character: Yeoman Zac Nguyen / High Lord Zacarias
guest_stars.name: David Huynh

episodes.name: Among the Lotus Eaters
episodes.overview: Returning to a planet that dredges up tragic memories, Captain Pike and his landing party find themselves forgetting everything, including their own identities as he confronts a ghost from his past.

episodes.name: Charades
episodes.overview: A shuttle accident leads to Spock's Vulcan DNA being removed by aliens, making him fully human and completely unprepared to face T'Pring's family during an important ceremonial dinner.

episodes.name: Lost in Translation
episodes.overview: Uhura seems to be the only one who can hear a strange sound. When the noise triggers terrifying hallucinations, she enlists an unlikely assistant to help her track down the source.

episodes.name: Those Old Scientists
episodes.overview: An accident while investigating a time portal sends Ensign Brad Boimler through time from the twenty-fourth century, and Captain Pike and his crew must get him back where he belongs before he can somehow alter the timeline.

episodes.name: Under the Cloak of War
episodes.overview: Captain Pike and his crew welcome a Klingon defector aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise, but his presence triggers the revelation of some shocking secrets.

episodes.name: Subspace Rhapsody
episodes.overview: An accident with an experimental quantum probability field causes everyone on the U.S.S. Enterprise to break uncontrollably into song, but the real danger is that the field is expanding and beginning to impact other ships—allies and enemies alike.

episodes.name: Hegemony
episodes.overview: When the U.S.S. Enterprise investigates an attack on a colony at the edge of Federation space, Captain Pike and his crew face the return of a formidable enemy.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise, under the command of Captain Christopher Pike, confronts increasingly dangerous stakes, explores uncharted territories and encounters new life and civilizations. The crew will also embark on personal journeys that will continue to test their resolve and redefine their destinies. Facing friends and enemies both new and familiar, their adventures will unfold in surprising ways never seen before.
